Reviews.Title: “My Stay in Paris”
Reviews.Author: 1966Doctor1234
Reviews.Content: trip paris booked trip advisor doubts sceptic pleasant surprise hotel easily approachable tube bus excellent front office staff understood spoke englishi didnt french feel home lots restuarants liking accesible main tourist destinations easily calm perfect ambience decided budget traveller safe

Reviews.Title: “Affordable, Clean and Comfortable - 4.5 out of 5 stars”
Reviews.Author: Vayne
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights 7 minute walk metro station 57 metro stops tourist hotel priced paris clean comfortable opted breakfast package woke earlier 10am paris cafes corner highly recommend learning metro system truly easiest affordable paris day passes youre set cheers

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: MilicaO
Reviews.Content: cute little hotel boutique feel moment arrive check greeted friendly receptionist expecting twostar bb spotless flatscreen plasma tv balcony superb view paris 6th floor bathroom extra comfy bed breakfast typically french choice pastries hams cheeses plus coffee tea juice value money short tenminute walk bienvenue montparnasse metro rail station shorter fiveminute walk metro

HotelInfo.Name: Abotel Transcontinental
HotelInfo.Address: 155, avenue Du Maine | 14th Arr., 75014 Paris, France
